DOC.brief_summary: Certain lung disease medication influence diagnostic test research investigation . This study investigate long ipratropium bromide must withhold methacholine challenge test conduct . This information useful validate current guideline .
DOC.brief_title: Duration Protective Effect From Inhaled Ipratropium Bromide Methacholine Airway Hyperresponsiveness
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis asthma ; stable control FEV1 great equal 65 % predict Concomitant lung disease asthma
